summary: A prostitute newly arrived in the South Pacific finds herself at odds with a stern missionary determined to save her soul.
cast: Joan Crawford|Walter Huston|Fred Howard|Ben Hendricks Jr.|William Gargan|Mary Shaw|Guy Kibbee|Kendall Lee|Beulah Bondi|Matt Moore|Walter Catlett
keywords: pago pago|prostitute|missionary|title same as play|south pacific
title: Bajo la lluvia
